matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: System - Processes executing in kernel mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="nice"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="softirq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="steal"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"^($node)$"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.legendFormat: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: Apps - Memory used by user-space applications
PageTables - Memory used to map between virtual and physical memory addresses
SwapCache - Memory that keeps track of pages that have been fetched from swap but not yet been modified
Slab - Memory used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use (caches like inode, dentry, etc)
Cache - Parked file data (file content) cache
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr:
# Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
kube_pod_info{host_network="false", pod="mongo-0"}
* on(pod)
# Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod.
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{pod="mongo-0"}[$__rate_interval]))

# Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
kube_pod_info{host_network="false", pod="mongo-0"}
* on(pod)
# Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod.
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{pod="mongo-0"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read, write, or (other) command)
panels.title: Latency Detail

panels.description: Ops or Replicated Ops/sec classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore). And (from the internal TTL threads) the docs deletes/sec by TTL indexes.

targets.expr:
avg by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{pod=~"$pod", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{pod=~"$pod", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{pod=~"$pod", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{pod=~"$pod", type!="command"}[5m]))

avg by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{pod=~"$pod", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{pod=~"$pod", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{pod=~"$pod", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{pod=~"$pod", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Command Operations

panels.description: Ratio of Documents returned or Index entries scanned / full documents scanned
panels.title: Query Efficiency

panels.description: This panel shows the number of objects (both data (scanned_objects) and index (scanned)) as well as the number of documents that were moved to a new location due to the size of the document growing. Moved documents only apply to the MMAPv1 storage engine.
panels.title: Scanned and Moved Objects

panels.description: Legacy driver operation: Number of getLastError commands that timed out trying to confirm write concern.
panels.title: getLastError Write Operations

panels.description: Legacy driver operation: Number of, and Sum of time spent, per second executing getLastError commands to confirm write concern.
panels.title: getLastError Write Time

panels.description: This panel shows the number of assert events per second on average over the given time period. In most cases assertions are trivial, but you would want to check your log files if this counter spikes or is consistently high.

targets.expr:
avg by (service_name,type) (rate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_asserts_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

panels.title: Assert Events

panels.description: Unix or Window memory page faults. Not necessarily from mongodb.

targets.expr:
avg by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_extra_info_page_faults_total{pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

panels.title: Page Faults
